description:
A man is always in a big hurry.  A terrible monster is defeated by a cat.  A rich man devises a cunning plan to marry off his daughter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awatemono no Hanashi / Unpenji no Neko / Yama Ori Chouja
The Story of the Man Who Was Always in a Hurry / The Cat of Unpenji Temple / The Yama-Ori Rich Man
あわてものの話 / 雲辺寺の猫 / 山おり長者
